properties.entry:
What is important for you in a relationship?
It is essential that you name your important subjects.
Choose between

  • not so important, i.e. you rather don't care if your partner does not have this characteristic
  • important, i.e. this characteristic is desirable
  • very important, i.e. absolutely required in your relationship
The following informations will be used for the search "Personal Values" to find matching partners..
